login.introText: To continue, please login with one of the providers below

oauth.introText: To login to Geona and use the administration tools you first need to configure an OAuth provider. Please complete the form below with the required details:
oauth.forbidden: OAuth provider details have already been set in config_server.json. Please contact the server administrator to make changes
oauth.googleIntro: For information on how to obtain OAuth credentials from Google please read Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs. During this process you will be asked for two key pieces of information these are:
oauth.GutHubIntro: To add GitHub OAuth please visit the Register a new OAuth application page on the GiHub website
oauth.administratorsExplanation: Please enter the email address of administrators. You must enter at least one addresss that is registered with the OAuth provider(s) that you select; multiple addresses should be separated with a comma

database.introText: Please select your preferred database configuration. The most simple is SQLite3 which uses a single file based database and requires very little configuration; Postgres offers more resilience and can handle a great number of users but requires more effort to configure and maintain
database.databaseOption: Please select the type of database that you would like to choose. If you are unsure, select SQLite and you can migrate to Postgres in the future
database.sqlitePath: Please specifiy the path for the SQLite database

oauth.administrators: Enter at least one administrator email address; multiple addresses should be comma separated
oauth.provider: Please select at least one OAuth provider and complete the details for the selected provider(s)
oauth.google_clientId: The Client ID for Google OAuth is required
oauth.google_secret: The Secret for Google OAuth is required
oauth.github_clientId: The Client ID for GitHub OAuth is required
oauth.github_secret: The Secret for GitHub OAuth is required

database.sqlitePath: Please enter the full path for the SQLite database
